globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: data: https://i.ytimg.com https://*.googleusercontent.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com;connect-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://coded-api.azurewebsites.net; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com;
